text: Hobolochitto Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Hobolochitto is a name derived from the Choctaw language. Variant names are "Abolo Chitto", "Abolochitto River", "Bola Chitto", "Bolla Chitto", and "Hobolo Chitto". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Pearl River County, Mississippi
title: Hobolochitto Creek
